channel.title: Home locations
channel.description:
What do you guys think what be the perfect home area or a 459 based server, the server itself is an economy with pking aswell.
Here are areas im thinking of
Varrock EdgeVille Shilo Village Falador Yanille Ardougne

item.title: Home locations
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:25, topic:526491”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=645235.msg4341741#msg4341741 date=1375264479]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=645235.msg4341640#msg4341640 date=1375245333]

create a 2d array of all coordinates of cities (major and minor)

new characters spawn at a random city. (shops are at all spawn locations)

add city teleports for all said cities

allow characters to set their own home at any location (not minigames)
[/quote]best option

yea and when someone logs into a city thats abandoned(which is likely) and immediately logs off, then that option wont look so good.

Off topic:

can we stop posting threads about server homes? nobody gives a shit anymore, and unless it’s custom, ANYWHERE you can name has already been used.
[/quote]easy to fix just add a tutorial of some sort to explain about the multi cities with cut scenes or just dialogues or just have the home teleport change cities every day/week

just makes the server look a lot less populated to me. It would work rlly good with a server like soulsplit[/quote]the weekly/daily changing wouldn’t make it appear any less played. simply give the players new things to look at every now and then. however, if the home is dynamic per player, then who cares how “empty” it is upon first starting. enjoy the player count per city quarters, ex: “There are currently 10 people online, with a total of 54 living in 7 cities.”

Read full topic

item.title: Home locations
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

I absolutely [u][i]HATE how everyone on Mopar says: “Amg uguise, ware i shud put home?”, like It’s a make or break choice. You guys shouldn’t worry about the name or home location if you have nothing else going for it.

P.S. I’m not saying this is the case in this specific thread. I’ve just been seeing this for years and am getting sick and tired of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Home locations
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Just a thought, an actual house. What is a home location? It’s a location you LIVE in.

I never really liked how people have a home teleport and you teleport to edge bank cause you don’t live in the bank generally speaking.

Read full topic
